title: Wallet Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully connect a supported crypto wallet using the Privy-based modal, including Coinbase Smart Wallet, and enter the 3D world without error.

steps.description: Navigate to the MonWorld platform landing page
Open the wallet connection modal
Select Coinbase Smart Wallet option from the modal
Authenticate and approve wallet connection
Verify the wallet is connected and user is transitioned to the 3D world environment
Confirm wallet address and balance are displayed correctly in the HUD overlay

title: Wallet Disconnect Functionality
description: Ensure users can disconnect their wallet from the HUD overlay and that session data is properly cleared and UI updated accordingly.

steps.description: Connect a wallet successfully via Privy modal
Open the wallet balance dropdown in the HUD overlay
Click the disconnect button
Verify the wallet is disconnected and the HUD updates to reflect no connected wallet
Confirm no residual wallet session or balance data remains in the UI state

title: Real-Time Agent Movement Synchronization
description: Validate that autonomous agents within the 3D world move as expected and their positions update in real-time, synced accurately between client and server.

steps.description: Connect a wallet and enter the 3D world environment
Observe autonomous agent entities moving within the scene
Verify agent positions update smoothly and consistently in real-time by comparing local rendering to server state
Check that visual status indicators on agents reflect their correct states

title: Dynamic Portal Visual Effects Rendering
description: Check that portals such as the Galaxy Portal render with correct custom GLSL shaders and dynamic visual effects like swirling vortex and bloom.

steps.description: Enter the 3D world and locate a dynamic portal entity
Verify the portal displays Fresnel glow and swirling vortex effects
Confirm bloom and noise post-processing effects are applied properly without visual glitches
Test portal visual effects consistency across various camera angles and distances

title: HUD Overlay Wallet Balance and Copy-to-Clipboard
description: Verify that the HUD wallet balance dropdown shows up-to-date balance and truncated wallet address, and that copy-to-clipboard correctly copies the full address.

steps.description: Connect a wallet and open the wallet balance dropdown in the HUD
Confirm the wallet balance is displayed accurately and updates on balance changes
Check the wallet address is truncated for display
Click the copy-to-clipboard button next to the wallet address
Verify the full, untruncated wallet address is copied to clipboard

title: Chat Message Real-Time Sync
description: Ensure chat messages sent by the user are sent through WebSocket, appear in the HUD chat, and are received in real-time by other connected clients.

steps.description: Connect to the platform and enter the world with chat HUD visible
Send a chat message via the chat input in HUD
Confirm the sent message appears instantly in the local chat log
Verify the message is broadcast and received by another client connected to the same world session

title: Camera Controls - Smooth Panning and Rotation
description: Verify camera controls provide fluid panning, rotation, and follow behaviors within the 3D environment as per design.

steps.description: Enter the 3D world environment
Use camera controls to pan across the infinite grid
Confirm camera movement is smooth without jitter or lag
Rotate camera and observe changes in viewpoint
Ensure rotation animations are fluid and maintain camera lock on target when applicable

title: State Management Consistency with Zustand
description: Confirm that global state managed by Zustand updates correctly for agents, world events, wallet balances, and UI states without conflicts or stale data.

steps.description: Connect wallet and observe initial states loaded
Trigger agent movement updates from server
Verify Zustand state reflects new agent positions and status correctly
Toggle dark mode and observe UI state change
Ensure Zustand stores the updated UI state properly

title: Backend API Endpoint Stability and Accuracy
description: Test Fastify backend API endpoints for accurate retrieval and update of world state, agent simulation data, and wallet info with proper error handling.

steps.description: Send API request to fetch current world simulation state
Verify response contains valid and current world data
Send API request to update agent position with valid payload
Confirm backend processes update and returns success status
Send malformed or invalid request payload to API endpoints
Verify backend returns appropriate error responses without crash

title: System Performance Under Poor Network Conditions
description: Verify system remains stable and responsive with minimal crashes or freezes when operating under slow or intermittent network connection scenarios.

steps.description: Simulate slow or intermittent network while connected to the 3D world
Confirm agent movement and state synchronization degrades gracefully without crashes
Verify fallback UI states and messages notify the user of degraded connectivity
Attempt wallet disconnect and reconnect during poor network
Ensure wallet connection state updates correctly and no session corruption occurs

title: Visual Effects Integrity for NPCs
description: Validate custom GLSL shader effects applied on NPC entities render correctly, including Fresnel glow and associated dynamic effects without artifacts.

steps.description: Locate World Guide NPC in the 3D environment
Confirm Fresnel glow and other custom shader effects display accurately
Check for absence of rendering artifacts or flickering on NPC models

title: HUD Dark Mode Toggle Functionality
description: Check that toggling the dark mode switch in the HUD overlay updates the UI theme instantly and persists state correctly.

steps.description: Open HUD overlay and toggle dark mode switch on
Verify UI theme changes to dark mode instantly
Toggle dark mode switch off
Confirm UI theme reverts to light mode

title: Wallet Address Truncation Utility Accuracy
description: Ensure utility functions correctly truncate wallet addresses for display while preserving correctness and no data loss.

steps.description: Provide full-length wallet addresses to the truncation utility
Verify truncated output matches expected format (e.g., first 6 and last 4 characters with ellipsis)
Ensure original wallet address is preserved in memory for copy-to-clipboard use

title: Agent Status Indicator Updates
description: Validate that agent entities update their visual status indicators (e.g., color or icon changes) dynamically based on backend state changes.

steps.description: Simulate a status change event from the backend for a specific agent
Confirm the agent's visual status indicator updates correctly in the 3D environment
Verify no latency or stale status displays occur for agent updates
